item.title: Tackling 25 SSL certificate limits for AWS Application Load Balancers
item.description: Disclaimer All information i write is of my own opinion, and is not reflective of AWS or Amazon. Last year, i’ve been in a discussion with a customer about how to manage SSL certificates when you use an Application Load Balancer (ALB). Currently, as of January 07 2021, ALB’s have a maximum of 25 SSL certificates. However, what happens if you want to host or support more than 25 certificates for your business?
